snippet: Rescuers had managed to pull seven survivors and one dead crew member out of the water after the 1,753-ton vessel Oryong 501 sank.
abstract: South Korean government and company officials report that fifty-two crew members remain missing in western Bering Sea after company's trawler sank.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers had managed to pull seven survivors and one dead crew member out of the water after the 1,753-ton vessel Oryong 501 sank.

headline.main: Dozens Missing After South Korean Trawler Sinks in Bering Sea
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Dozens Missing After Trawler Sinks
